KA_Analysis.K1: The candidate will respond to a series of short answer questions related to AI-generated script ideation techniques for world-building, storyline and character development, scenario iterations.
KA_Analysis.A1: The candidate will perform a practical exercise on analyzing AI output for bias and taking corrective steps and submit their analysis.
KA_Analysis.K2: The candidate will respond to questions about copyright law covering Gen AI usage to demonstrate understanding.
KA_Analysis.A2: The candidate will utilize NLP techniques and tools to enhance the quality and effectiveness of AI-generated story elements in a practical exam.
KA_Analysis.K3: The candidate will answer questions on Gen AI tool limitations and solutions to assess their knowledge.
KA_Analysis.A3: The candidate will apply ethical considerations in the selection of prompts and reference usage during a practical exam.
KA_Analysis.K4: The candidate will explain awareness and correction of bias in LLMs training data reproduced in output through written responses.
KA_Analysis.A4: The candidate will filter and script-edit Gen-AI output in a practical exam to demonstrate their skills.
KA_Analysis.K5: The candidate will answer questions on best practices to minimize plagiarism risk to show understanding.
KA_Analysis.A5: The candidate will use AI-generated text techniques and methodologies to develop script elements in a practical exam.
KA_Analysis.K6: The candidate will respond to questions about AI tools for script analysis and market research to demonstrate knowledge.
KA_Analysis.A6: The candidate will apply and adjust relevant prompts in the generative process to improve iterations during a practical exam.
KA_Analysis.K7: The candidate will answer questions on Gen AI and ethics awareness to assess their understanding.
KA_Analysis.A7: The candidate will identify key terms and themes for input into Gen AI platform to ideate and iterate story elements in a practical exam.
KA_Analysis.K8: The candidate will respond to questions on basic NLP techniques and tools relevant to AI text generation to demonstrate knowledge.
KA_Analysis.A8: The candidate will incorporate unique creative principles and storytelling elements into AI-generated story ideas during a practical exam.
KA_Analysis.K9: The candidate will answer questions on creative principles and storytelling in AI-generated text prompts to assess understanding.
KA_Analysis.A9: The candidate will identify copyright risk in Gen-AI production and avoid copyright infringement in a practical exam.
KA_Analysis.K10: The candidate will respond to questions on basic AI algorithms and models used in script/text generation to demonstrate knowledge.
